name: agora-appbuilder-core
description: React Native template for RTE app builder

scripts.uikit: rm -rf template/agora-rn-uikit && git clone https://github.com/AgoraIO-Community/ReactNative-UIKit template/agora-rn-uikit && cd template/agora-rn-uikit && git checkout ab-dev-auto
scripts.ci: cd template && npm run web:build && cd ../ && cp ./vercel.json ./template/dist
